| HistoryText             = Celestial Gardeners were [[Celestials]] tasked with the mission of planting life on new worlds by using [[Life Seed]]s and growing new [[Apocalypse]] servants to shepherd their evolution by using [[Death Seed]]s.{{r|Uncanny Avengers Vol 1 9}}

The Celestial Gardener responsible for [[Earth]] was summoned from the far side of [[Earth-616|the universe]] to the [[Starcore|Starcore Station]] by [[En Sabah Nur (Earth-616)|En Sabah Nur]]'s son, [[William Rolfson (Earth-616)|Genocide]], when he felt ready to succeed his deceased father as the new evolutionary caretaker of Earth. Finding Genocide worthy after reading his very soul, the Celestial was about to empower him with a Death Seed when the [[Apocalypse Twins (Earth-616)|Apocalypse Twins]] appeared. Initially curious, the Celestial's feelings towards the twin [[Homo superior|mutants]] shifted into sadness when [[Uriel (Mutant) (Earth-616)|Uriel]] used the enchanted axe [[Jarnbjorn]] to cleave wide its unbreakable hull, but only because its death would bring severe consequences to the life it had tended for so long.{{r|Uncanny Avengers Vol 1 7}} Its corpse was later taken to the [[Akkaba Nebula]], where [[Eimin (Earth-616)|Eimin]] pried Death and Life Seeds from its chest to use in the creation of the [[Horsemen of Apocalypse (Earth-616)#Horsemen of Death|Horsemen of Death]].{{r|Uncanny Avengers Vol 1 9}}

| Equipment               = Celestial Gardeners carry Death and Life Seeds with themselves.
